Description: MarketId of the market's trades we want to fetch
ID of the subaccount the trades belong to
Will skipt the first N items from the result
Maximum number of items to be returned
The starting timestamp in UNIX milliseconds that the trades must be equal or older than
The ending timestamp in UNIX milliseconds that the trades must be equal or newer than
List of MarketIDs the trades can belong to
Subaccount ids of traders we want to get trades. Use this field for fetching trades from multiple subaccounts
List of execution types. The execution types are: market, limitFill, limitMatchRestingOrder, limitMatchNewOrder
ID of the trade to return
Injective address the trade belongs to
The client order ID of the order generating the trade
Injective address of the fee recipient
